issue.title: [Doc] Cookbook Release 2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13707](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13707). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1v-jK_9osnLvAnAjLOM_frgzakjFhLpUi8OC0MlKpxzw/edit lists a bunch of more recipes that were deferred for release 2, we should aim at completing them
